channel.title: Dimitris Glezos' old personal site - Personal

item.title: Blog temporarily off
item.description:
I now blog on miniblog.glezos.com and tweet regularly at @glezos.

Oh, and for those living under a rock, I now work on my startup, Transifex. I blog there too.

Apologies for not updating this for so long. See you on the above links for now!
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Maemo Summit
item.description: Yeehaa! I’m going to the Maemo Summit baby! Amsterdam, long time no see! #maesum
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: I now have an Amazon Wishlist!
item.description: I recently bought a birthday present to a good friend as a ‘thank you’ to all the great stuff he’s done. Seeing how useful a wishlist could be, I decided to create an Amazon wishlist of my own. People who like me (or my work) now have the chance …
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Friday nights
item.description:
What I love about Friday nights (post-clubbing post-3am):

  • The feeling
  • The Italian and Spanish songs on the radio on the way back home
  • The empty narrow streets
  • The delicious open bakery at the top part of Agiou Nicolaou street in Patras


(cc) by junkmonkey
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Software #!$@!
item.description: My software tortures me. WordPress just marked a bunch of past good comment as spam (sorry guys!), and Firefox auto-deleted its history and bookmarks.
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Pumped
item.description:
So I admit it. I love adventures. Guilty as charged.

I’m not sure what chemical substances or which exact butterfly wing flaps caused this. It’ was always there, from a kid I guess, a mutation extraordinaire. Things go wrong and I like it. Problems come up and I feel …
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Dawn
item.description: Successfully finishing a big task of yours with sunrise… Priceless feeling.
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Notes from Amsterdam
item.description:
(cc) by liber

  • Feeling like the guy with the best host’s house in the world.
  • Went for a walk at the local Saturday market. We bought a few stuff to cook some nice dishes during the week.
  • On Saturday afternoon the city felt more like Edinburgh than Amsterdam. The …
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Amsterdam packing
item.description: Almost ready for a week-long trip to Amsterdam, hosting courtesy of Max Spevack. Expecting lots of hacking, fantastic discussions and good food. Two meetings in Athens before leaving Greece at 2:30pm… long first half of day tomorrow, looking forward to the special moment before the plane take-off.
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos

item.title: Sunday Turkish Coffee
item.description: Enjoying a cup of good Turkish coffee.
item.dc:creator: Dimitris Glezos
